classData.comment:
/**
 * A wrapper div containing 2 Buttons.
 * We are extending button.Base and are using getVdomRoot() to map the main Button into the first vdom child.
 * @class Neo.button.Split
 * @extends Neo.button.Base
 */
classData.description: A wrapper div containing 2 Buttons. We are extending button.Base and are using getVdomRoot() to map the main Button into the first vdom child.
classData.name: Split

classData.comment:

         * Use triggerButtonConfig to pass initial config for it.

classData.description: Read only, it will get created inside the ctor. Use triggerButtonConfig to pass initial config for it.
